::Shadow Wing::
She woke up from the stasis lock and was frightened. 
She sat up on the table and looked at her form. She watched the form 
change and take on new atribute, new ones that she had never konwn of 
before. She go up and stood next to the table.  She looked at saw 
Veratis. She spoke, but her voice was scratchy and rough."What have 
you done? Why is this happeneing? Why not give me my old form back? 
Where is Lunarpine?" She searched his mind, hoping too find the 
answers.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "CYBERWOLF4" <cyberwolf4@p...> wrote:
> Veratis tried not to think, Shadow Wing could obviously sense every 
thought.
> he released the hold on the DNA scanner, it wasn't doing anything 
more than
> slow her growth. scans showed that somehow her Spark had 
reconfigured her
> form to an owl. and the body had selected the form from the DNA 
he'd given
> it. she wasn't turning into a fuzor, she was becoming something new.
